divs: Sighting Detailsjust outside of my residence, I was having a chat with my friend over a cigarette, ana when we looked at the sky just to watch the clouds passing by, we saw a green line with a length of two air planes. it stayed there for almost 3 hours and after that clouds kicked in and blocked the view, and when the clouds passed on, the gree lighted line was gone, I can explaine what that was, I tried so hard to imagine what that was, but I could not find any reasenable explanation. Now I don't believe in UFO's but I'm diying to know what was that green light in the sky. PS: I tried to take a picture or recorded video, but it was so dark so nothing appeared on the pictures or the video.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Halifax
There were no other sightings in Halifax on or around July 8th 2009
